services.name: rdf-store
services.description: A RDF store to hold semantic relations between data objects

services.name: vector-store
services.description: A fulltext index using embeddings to find similar data

services.name: a2a-server
services.description: Contains two external agents and a list for discovery

services.name: webserver
services.description: Allows Etienne to create and expose API endpoints. The server is capable of hot-reloading.

services.name: telegram
services.description: Telegram provider for Etienne remote sessions

services.name: ms-teams
services.description: Microsoft Teams provider for Etienne remote sessions

services.name: imap-connector
services.description: Listens for incoming emails via IMAP IDLE and publishes events
